Name: Crocodile Transformator
About the game: The city is in danger again ... Crocodile Transformator is an action game where your mission is to defend your city by destroying the enemies.Now is your time to help civilization to live in peace. Your destiny is to defeat all the enemy machines, by using your abilities to transform you from a robot into a destroyer machine. You will encounter all kinds of predestined inventions to erase humanity from the universe, such as: droids, monster trucks, tanks BUT there is no term to compare between you and them. The best defense is to attack, attack and again attack! Game Features : - Different levels - Possibility to choose fighting between Robot Power,Robot Ability and Speedy Car - Enemies like : tanks,trucks,droids
